body:
Hi everyone,



I'm working on a model that change its blinds angle depending on hour. This hourly angle is based on a sun mask study that i have made. The question is: is there a way to run an annual daylight simulation with specific blinds angles for every hour?



Thank you all for your attention!!
topic: [Question] how to create a hourly angle schedule for blinds in annual daylight simulation?

replies.body: I'm not sure if daysim provides that much of flexibility. You can run the model for each shading angle separately, read the results and merge them together based on the sun-angle.
